title: Update client inquiry form with comprehensive fields

requirements.text: Update the ContactSection component to include the following form fields: Full Name (text input), Email Address (email input), Phone Number (tel input), Company / Business Name (text input), Website Type (dropdown with options: Personal, Business, E-Commerce, Portfolio), Features / Requirements (textarea), Budget (text input), Deadline (date picker input), and Additional Notes (textarea)

quotes: Add/Update form fields for clients: Full Name, Email Address, Phone Number, Company / Business Name, Website Type (dropdown: Personal, Business, E-Commerce, Portfolio), Features / Requirements (textarea), Budget, Deadline (date picker), Additional Notes (textarea)

acceptanceCriteria: ContactSection form includes all 9 specified fields
Website Type dropdown contains exactly the four options: Personal, Business, E-Commerce, Portfolio
Features/Requirements and Additional Notes use textarea elements
Deadline uses a date input type
All fields are properly labeled and accessible

requirements.text: Create a backend endpoint in main.mo to handle client inquiry form submissions, accepting Full Name, Email Address, Phone Number, Company Name, Website Type, Features/Requirements, Budget, Deadline, and Additional Notes as parameters, and storing the inquiry data

quotes: Ensure frontend React form fields are properly connected to backend Express route

acceptanceCriteria: Backend function accepts all 9 form field parameters
Function stores client inquiry data persistently
Function returns success confirmation upon valid submission
Function handles validation for required fields

requirements.text: Connect the ContactSection form submission to the backend inquiry endpoint using React Query mutation, handling loading states, success feedback, and error handling

quotes: Ensure frontend React form fields are properly connected to backend Express route

acceptanceCriteria: Form submission calls the backend inquiry endpoint with all field values
Loading state is displayed during submission
Success message appears after successful submission
Error handling displays appropriate feedback for failed submissions
Form resets after successful submission

requirements.text: Remove the existing 'Message' field from ContactSection and replace it with the new comprehensive form fields, ensuring no unused or redundant fields remain

quotes: Remove any unused or redundant fields

acceptanceCriteria: Old 'Message' field is removed from the form
Only the 9 specified fields are present in the form
No duplicate or unused form inputs exist in ContactSection

requirements.text: Maintain the existing coral and charcoal visual design system, modern typography, responsive grid layout, and smooth transitions in the updated ContactSection form

quotes: Maintain clean, modern UI and responsive design

acceptanceCriteria: Form styling uses existing coral accent colors and charcoal backgrounds
Form is fully responsive on mobile, tablet, and desktop viewports
Input fields use consistent styling with other site components
Hover and focus states include smooth transitions

requirements.text: Create a React Query hook in useQueries.ts for submitting client inquiries, following the existing pattern of other query hooks in the file

quotes: Ensure frontend React form fields are properly connected to backend Express route

acceptanceCriteria: New mutation hook follows the naming convention and structure of existing hooks
Hook uses the actor instance from useActor
Hook integrates with React Query's mutation system
Hook is exported and available for use in ContactSection

constraints: Do not modify the admin login functionality or authentication system
Do not change the admin dashboard page or its user management features
Keep the Layout component, navigation, and overall site structure unchanged
Maintain the existing four-feature design system (coral/charcoal colors, typography, spacing, transitions)
Do not alter HeroSection, ServicesSection, PortfolioSection, or AboutSection components
Follow the existing single-actor backend architecture in main.mo
nonGoals: Adding email notification functionality for form submissions
Creating an admin interface to view submitted inquiries
Implementing form field validation beyond basic required field checks
Adding file upload capability to the form
Creating automated responses or confirmation emails
